note.p: Letter not found. MS is a file copy annotated '1698/2533 Abschrift versandt: 15/VII. 1880' [Copy sent 15 July 1880].

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
p.seg: für Wissenschaften, Künste und allgemeine Bildung in

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: an Herrn Dr. med. et phil. Ferdinand Baron von Müller Mr F D H.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: d. Z. Stiftsrath des freien Deutschen Hochstiftes

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: A date has not been inserted.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: Unter Bescheinigung des Empfanges Ihrer geehrten Sendung vom (Poststempel 28/V.) d. J. mit welcher Sie die Güte hatten, uns Ihren

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: Plants indigenous in the neighbourhood of Sidney

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: freundlich mitzutheilen, und indem wir uns beehren, hinueber unsere " Berichte 1878/79" ergebenst zu überreichen,

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
p.seg: danken wir Ihnen verbindlichst und bitten um Erhaltung Ihres ferneren gütigen Wohlwollens für unsere Stiftung.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: for Sciences, Arts and general Culture in

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p:
to Dr. Med and phil. Ferd Baron von Mueller Mr F.D.H.
Meister des Freien Deutschen Hochstiftes [Master of the Free German Academy]. State plant researcher at present councillor of the Free German Academy

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p:
Under certification of receipt of your esteemed consignment of (postmarked 28 May this year) with which you had the goodness to kindly convey to us your Plants indigenous in the neighbourhood of Sidney,
i.e. Woolls (1880). whilst having the honour to most humbly present our "Report 1878/79", we thank you kindly and request support of your further kindly goodwill for our academy.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;

cell.p:
V.
Dr. G. H. Otto Volger.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;
